mapper.sql: param_setting.id AS paramSetting_id, param_setting.assess_money AS paramSetting_assessMoney, param_setting.cash_pledge AS paramSetting_cashPledge, param_setting.rent_day_money AS paramSetting_rentDayMoney, param_setting.decrease_day AS paramSetting_decreaseDay, param_setting.decreasepro_portion AS paramSetting_decreaseproPortion, param_setting.least_rent_day_money AS paramSetting_leastRentDayMoney, param_setting.overtime_day AS paramSetting_overtimeDay, param_setting.punishment_overtime_day AS paramSetting_punishmentOvertimeDay, param_setting.overtime_money AS paramSetting_overtimeMoney, param_setting.punishment_overtime_money AS paramSetting_punishmentOvertimeMoney

id AS id, assess_money AS assessMoney, cash_pledge AS cashPledge, rent_day_money AS rentDayMoney, decrease_day AS decreaseDay, decreasepro_portion AS decreaseproPortion, least_rent_day_money AS leastRentDayMoney, overtime_day AS overtimeDay, punishment_overtime_day AS punishmentOvertimeDay, overtime_money AS overtimeMoney, punishment_overtime_money AS punishmentOvertimeMoney
mapper.select: select from param_setting AND id=#{id} AND assess_money=#{assessMoney} AND cash_pledge=#{cashPledge} AND rent_day_money=#{rentDayMoney} AND decrease_day=#{decreaseDay} AND decreasepro_portion=#{decreaseproPortion} AND least_rent_day_money=#{leastRentDayMoney} AND overtime_day=#{overtimeDay} AND punishment_overtime_day=#{punishmentOvertimeDay} AND overtime_money=#{overtimeMoney} AND punishment_overtime_money=#{punishmentOvertimeMoney}
